description_hello: Hello and welcome to my portfolio!
description_about: Front-end developer. Passionate about developing applications and solving problems during their development, helping projects from idea to implementation. Strong administrative and leadership skills. Responsible and confident in dealing with clients, colleagues and management. Excellent organization and time management skills, ability to work both as part of a team and independently. Ability to prioritize and delegate when necessary. Self-learning when necessary.
description_Thank_you: Thank you for visiting my portfolio. I invite you to explore my projects and learn more about my journey as a web developer.
